name: Greg's Deadly Draft
description:
Brought to tryout by an EVIL mascot shark...

Play against Greg White Shark in a battle for your life as he tries to recruit you for his failing football team.

Use your football against targets...

Greg is putting you through several trials to see if you would make a good fit on his roster.

Throw the anchor to stop foes...

Once used as a prop for entertainment, now utilized to stop an enemy right in it's tracks.

Collect serum to gain a speed boost...

Dropped by your adversaries is a potion that gives you an advantage in combat and stealth.

Make your way to the depths of the stadium and find the clues to get your way out!
